arts.ttl: Fingers firmly pointed at guilty Portsmouth parties after Derby County debacle
arts.sum: The Pompey players culpable for the shocking defending at Derby have been named and shamed.

arts.ttl: Gary Rowett weighs in on 'unfair' Paul Warne 'sugar' storm as Derby County sweep aside Portsmouth
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Gary Rowett felt Derby County finally got the win their recent performances deserved when they hammered Portsmouth at Pride Park last night.

arts.ttl: ‘Absolute joke. Shambolic. Need investment in experience and class’ – The Portsmouth reaction to 4-0 defeat at Derby
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to Pompey’s 4-0 defeat to Derby.

arts.ttl: 'I don't want to comment': Why Portsmouth boss is tight-lipped on under-fire defender's Derby display
arts.sum: John Mousinho declined to deliver an immediate judgement on Tom McIntyre’s Pompey performance in the aftermath of their Pride Park thumping.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne makes surprising Derby County admission after Portsmouth demolition
arts.sum: Derby were three goals to the good before half-time as Kane Wilson scored the opener inside 10 minutes before further goals came from Eiran Cashin and Ebou Adams. The win lifted Derby up to 14th in the table after their biggest victory of the campaign and reflecting on the win, Derby head coach Warne said: "It was good, but I thought we played better in other home games weirdly.

arts.ttl: 'We got exactly what we deserved': Portsmouth boss blasts players after Derby horror show
arts.sum: John Mousinho blasted Pompey’s wretched Pride Park display and admitted: ‘We got exactly what we deserved’.

arts.ttl: 'Dreadful game, Tough, tough evening, Uncharacteristically quiet': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Derby
arts.sum: Awful Pompey slumped to a 4-0 defeat at Derby following a wretched display.

arts.ttl: Derby County suffer big injury blow in Championship clash with Portsmouth
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Cashin then added a second before Adams made it 3-0 to Derby before half-time as the Rams received a standing ovation at the break.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Portsmouth as rampant Rams crush Pompey but suffer Eiran Cashin blow - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: And Warne's side then made it three when more good work from Mendez-Laing saw him feed Craig Forsyth whose cross was met by Ebou Adams with his shot taking a deflection off Tom Mcintyre. Kane Wilson got the ball rolling when he raced into the box to meet a Nathaniel Mendez-Laing cross after Ebou Adams and Marcus Harness had combined in midfield.
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Derby County and Portsmouth.
